instructions:
Check out the 13th Age [Sheet Guide](https://wiki.roll20.net/13th_Age_Official_Sheet) for tips and tricks on getting the most out of the offical sheet.

Be sure to include the 13th Age [Companion API Script](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-api-scripts/tree/master/13th%20Age%20Official%20Character%20Sheet%20Companion) available on the Roll20 API script repository.
